price: Ili imwonye aliye hai, na neno litimie juu ya makafiri.
arabic: لِّيُنذِرَ مَن كَانَ حَيّٗا وَيَحِقَّ ٱلۡقَوۡلُ عَلَى ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ
footnotes: Hii Qur'ani ni kumtia khofu mwenye moyo ulio hai ulio nawirika kwa akili. Na ipite hukumu ya adhabu kuwashukia wanao ipinga Qur'ani, wenye kukataa uwongofu wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: liyundhira man kāna ḥayyan wayaḥiqqa al-qawlu ʿalā al-kāfirīna
